short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhances Elhi's features with what you do on a browser. Currently compatible with Google Meet. Works only with Elhi Desktop App.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elhi sPresence Cube is a Busylight that syncs with various support VC platforms without any login. We want to offer a seamless experience to our users and we are extending the same to the Chrome Browser. Starting with the Google Meet, we plan to soon support various other web based VC platforms and custom events.

This extension is currently meant only for BETA testing. It will only work with Elhi sPresence Desktop Application specially released for the chrome sync. Please contact us at support@elhi.tech for getting access to the BETA release.

Please use this extension only if you agree to test the BETA features.
